name: No Pain No Gain - Weekly Hour Game Jam
name_original: No Pain No Gain - Weekly Hour Game Jam
description:
Built in just under an hour for the Weekly Hour Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/weekly-hour-game-jam-w29-2017), using Kenny Assets and Ozzed music, this is, by far, one of the stupidest things I've ever made.

So of course, I love it.

But you probably shouldn't play it.
